com.bigdata.quorum

Interface QuorumListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    QuorumClient<S>, QuorumMember<S>, QuorumService<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHostLBSPolicy, AbstractLBSPolicy, AbstractQuorumClient, AbstractQuorumMember, CountersLBSPolicy, FutureTaskInvariantMon, GangliaLBSPolicy, MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum.MockQuorumWatcher, NOPLBSPolicy, QuorumServiceBase, RoundRobinLBSPolicy

    public interface QuorumListener
    An interface for receiving informational quorum events. These events are intended for clients interested in quorum state changes. Services that are HA aware use a more intimate API to handle the state changes.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notify(QuorumEvent e)
      Notify the client of a quorum event.

    • Method Detail

      • notify

        void notify(QuorumEvent e)
        Notify the client of a quorum event.

        The listener MUST NOT take any event that could block. In particular, it MUST NOT wait on another thread that will access the Quorum as that will cause a deadlock around the internal lock maintained by the Quorum.
